name: TV Shows Trivia Game | Name The Show | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which show does Jennifer Aniston act in?
questions.explanation:
Friends.

	She portrays Rachel. Rachel is Monica's best friend during high school. She is a fashion enthusiast.

Scott Weinger.

	Steve is D.J's boyfriend. They later break up, and in the last episode, he returns to take D.J to the prom.

questions.text: On the television adaptation of Jacqueline Wilson's "The Story of Tracy Beaker", who plays Louise?
questions.explanation:
Chelsea Padley.

	Louise was Tracy's former best friend. Lisa Coleman plays Cam, Tracy's foster mother. Dani Harmer plays Tracy and Montanna Thompson plays Justine Littlewood.

Kiefer Sutherland.

	Carlos played Tony Almeida, James Badge Dale plays Chase Edmunds, and William Devane plays James Heller. It started airing on November 6th, 2001.

questions.text: Who was Theodore 'Ted' Buckland played by on "Scrubs"?
questions.explanation:
Sam Lloyd.

	He played a hospital attorney for 88 episodes. His first appearance was on the episode, 'My First Day.' He is a lawyer.

questions.text: Who plays Jim on "According to Jim"?
questions.explanation:
Jim Belushi.

	"According to Jim" is about a father of five children, called Jim, who gets himself into sticky situations and is always looking for the easier way to get out of it. He is fond of Blues music. He is married to a woman called Cheryl and has five children, Ruby, Gracie, Kyle, Jonathan and Gordon.

questions.text: On the Disney channel show "Hannah Montana", who plays Rico?
questions.explanation:
Moises Arias.

	Moises Arias plays Rico. He is Jackson's boss. Jason Earles plays Jackson, Mitchell Musso plays Oliver and Cody Linely plays Jake. Rico usually gets Jackson in trouble.

questions.text: Who was Gabrielle Solis played by on "Desperate Housewives"?
questions.explanation:
Eva Longoria.

	Felicity Huffman plays Lynette Scavo. Anne Hathaway and Ashlee Simpson do not star on 'Desperate Housewives'.

questions.text: Which character does Eva Longoria play on "The Young and the Restless"?
questions.explanation:
Isabella.

	She played Isabella Brana Williams. Jenna, Carla and Janice are all people who I made up. She played Isabella from March 8th, 2001 to August 15th, 2003. In the end, Isabella was put in a mental hospital.

questions.text: Who played Hal on "Malcolm in the Middle"?
questions.explanation:
Bryan Cranston & Brian Cranston & Cranston.

	Frankie Muniz played Malcolm. It was nominated for the Golden Globe Awards. There are seven seasons. It is a show about five brothers.
